text: Rift.Canyon.Dreams is the second EP by the U.S. doom metal band Burning Witch. It was originally released in 1998 on Merciless Records, to a limited distribution of 500 copies. It is available on the compilation Crippled Lucifer (Seven Psalms for Our Lord of Light), through Southern Lord Records.Encyclopaedia Metallum - Burning Witch - Rift.Canyon.Dreams ==Track listing== # "Warning Signs" – 8:22 # "Stillborn" – 11:57 # "History of Hell (Crippled Lucifer)" – 6:03 # "Communion" – 8:43 ==Personnel== *Stephen O'Malley – guitar *G.
